product_name: The North Face Radium High-Loft Hoodie Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Radium High-Loft fleece hoodie provides incredible warmth while reducing weight and bulk for your backcountry skiing and mountaineering adventures. Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) High-Loft is a polyester fleece stitched in a baffle pattern that traps warmth, increases airflow and promotes compressibility. Fabric delivers the highest warmth-to-weight ratio of any The North Face high-loft fleece. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) Pro side panels enhance movement. The North Face Radium High-Loft hoodie features zippered handwarmer pockets that are accessible while wearing a climbing harness or pack. Bonded chest pocket.
